detail_desc: Ankle-length cigarette trousers in soft, stretch twill made from a linen blend with a regular waist and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem with creases and a slit at the hems.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in patterned organic cotton. Dress with narrow shoulder straps and flare to the hem. Pants with elastication at the waist and hems.
Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in patterned organic cotton. Dress with narrow shoulder straps and flare to the hem. Pants with elastication at the waist and hems.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a print motif, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.
Maxi dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Unlined.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and legs with seams and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and legs with seams and ribbed hems.
Vest top in slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with lace panels down the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with lace panels down the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a polo shirt and pair of shorts in soft fabric. Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a decorative button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a polo shirt and pair of shorts in soft fabric. Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a decorative button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.

Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Short-sleeved bolero in loose-knit cotton with a button at the top and ribbing around the neckline. Short sleeves with scalloped edges and a scalloped edge around the opening.
Sleeveless cotton jersey dresses in various designs with a gathered seam at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of trousers in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a cotton jersey T-shirt and pair of denim shorts. T-shirt with an all-over print and ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs. Slim fit.

Set with a cotton jersey T-shirt and pair of denim shorts. T-shirt with an all-over print and ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs. Slim fit.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Top in jersey with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short coat in sturdy cotton canvas with notch lapels and concealed fastening at the front with a wide button band. Baggy at the top, side panels for added width and a wide belt with a covered buckle. Wide sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, chest pockets and large patch front pockets with a flap. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with one button at the front, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless romper suit in slub cotton jersey with press-studs down the front, raw-edge patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless romper suit in slub cotton jersey with press-studs down the front, raw-edge patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a zebra-striped crêpe weave with wide notch lapels and one button at the front. Chest pocket, an inner pocket, flap front pockets, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Belt with a metal buckle and a cut-out section at the back of the waist. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight-cut legs with a seam at the front and flare at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, wide trousers woven in a linen blend with a zip fly and concealed inner button. High waist with a sewn-in turnover and belt loops. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs with a pleat at the top for added volume.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with striped side-panels. Top with a small flock print at the top, press-studs at the back, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Tailored trousers in a wool blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs with creases.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a low waist, low crotch, button fly, front pockets and welt back pockets. Tapered legs that have sewn-on panels with decorative seams, and lacing lower down at the sides to the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide shorts in pattern-weave viscose with a sheen. High waist with pleats, wide belt loops and a detachable tie belt with a metal buckle. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a lower crotch, a large open front pocket and flap back pockets. Legs with folded side panels and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide shorts in cotton twill. High waist with pleats, wide belt loops and a detachable tie belt with a metal buckle. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a lower crotch, a large open canvas front pocket and flap back pockets. Legs with folded side panels and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flared legs.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Straight-cut blouse in softly draping silk with a round neckline, covered button at the top and an asymmetric decorative fold to create a draped effect at the front. Long sleeves and wide, flared, double cuffs with a covered button and asymmetric slit. Wide hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lace, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lace-covered elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lace, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lace-covered elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with a low waist with lace-covered elastication.
Briefs in an airy silk blend with a low waist with lace-covered elastication.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a hood and shawl collar. No buttons.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
